item.description: Logging # Descriptive / Contextual / Reactive - Actionable If I read this log, what should I understand ? Log events, should be like a story : start of the operation, relevant things and the conclusion (good or bad) CRITICAL level = wake up someone at 3am DEBUG level in prod use JSON format, use the same json structure (fields) across services use different handlers the verbose flag can simply change the level of the handler to DEBUG
